file.name: xg_firewall.yaml
file.content:
components:
  schemas:
    tmp0:
      properties:
        error: {type: string}
      type: object
  securitySchemes:
    BasicAuth: {scheme: basic, type: http}
info:
  contact: {email: frikky@shuffler.io, name: '@frikkylikeme', url: 'https://twitter.com/frikkylikeme'}
  description: Automated generation of Sophos XG Firewall
  title: Sophos XG Firewall
  version: 1.0.0
  x-logo: data:image/png;base64,
openapi: 3.0.2
paths:
  tmp0:
    post:
      description: Blocks a given IP address on the Sophos XG firewall
      parameters:
      - description: Name to register block as
        example: 'Malicious Host #1'
        in: query
        name: Name of Host
        required: true
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: The IP address to block
        example: 192.168.0.1
        in: query
        name: IP Address
        required: true
        schema: {type: string}
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/tmp0'}
          description: Successful request
      summary: Sophos XG Block IP
tags:
- {name: Network Security & Management}

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: path "tmp0": path MUST begin with a forward slash
